image_2.description: QUEEN ALICE is an arched doorway that Alice encounters, symbolizing a transition or a new role for her.

image_3.description: The Leg of Mutton is introduced to Alice by the Red Queen and behaves in a manner akin to a person, bowing and speaking.

image_4.description: Dinner with Queens is the event where Alice is invited to dine with the Red Queen and the White Queen, featuring unusual occurrences.

image_5.description: The Red Queen is a character who interacts with Alice, pushing her and causing mischief, eventually turning into a kitten.
